dct_title_s: A map of part of Rhode Island shewing the positions of the American and British armies at the siege of Newport, and the subsequent action on the 29th of August, 1778
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. "Engraved for Washington's life." From: The life of George Washington / by John Marshall. Philadelphia : Printed and published by C.P. Wayne ..., 1807. Plate VII.
